name: UnTiled (Jake Mills' Games)
description:
Collect the Colours and Bring Light to the Scene in this Game Jam Creation! Game Info

Traverse your shape across the real time music spectrum to collect the colours of the rainbow and light up the canvas. Challenge your friends to see who is the fastest!

Version Info

The current version is 1.0. This is the only version of the game.

Controls

Keyboard & Mouse

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Space
  • Pause - Escape
Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just extract the downloaded ZIP file and launch the executable within the extracted folder.

Credits

This game was made in less than 2 days, in collaboration with:

  • Ben Loft
  • Fraser Fallows
  • David Csontos
Project Info

This small game was made in less than two days for a game jam. The theme was Diversity and Inclusivity.

Enjoy Playing!
